subtitle: I create accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences for the web.

about.main_section: I'm a software developer with over 4 years of experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NextJS and React Native. I'm an enthusiast of using Artificial Intelligence for development and started my studies in the area this year.
about.footer_section: I am passionate about creating products that users love, both as a profession and as a hobby. I am a versatile professional, with communication skills in Portuguese and English, and familiarity with agile methodologies.

experience.footer_content: · I built features similar to those of social networks such as Instagram, LinkedIn, WhatsApp and Facebook, using 100% React Native. · I upgraded obsolete projects using the ReactJS and React Native frameworks.
